items.summary: Update the footer social links to include clickable Instagram and X (Twitter) icons that open in a new tab and point to the provided profiles: https://instagram.com/babu_sarraf_ji and https://x.com/babu_sarraf_ji. Keep icon styling minimal/modern with proper spacing, a soft glow hover effect matching the dark “study vibe” theme, and ensure the icons are responsive on mobile and desktop.

Add the same Instagram and X social icon links to the top-right corner of the landing page header (near the existing header/profile area), using the same minimal modern style, spacing, and soft glow hover effect. These header icons must open the provided links in a new tab.
Add optional follow text under the timer in non-streamer mode: “Follow for daily study motivation – @babu_sarraf_ji”. Ensure it fits the minimal study aesthetic and does not appear in Streamer Mode.
Ensure any social icons rendered on the /timer route are automatically hidden when Streamer Mode is enabled (to keep the browser-source overlay clean).
